title: Living Prem Acupuncture & Ayurveda
cleaned_text: a word for "love." More specifically, it refers to pure, unconditional love. Living Prem Holistic Wellness is dedicated to supporting and optimizing women's health. We believe in empowering women to embrace their true selves, promoting liberation, freedom, embodiment, sexuality, and empowered menstrual cycles. Our holistic approach encompasses physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual well-being, encouraging women to live their best lives. Our mission is to provide women with the tools, resources, and support they need to reclaim their power and prioritize their well-being. We aim to create a community where women can feel liberated, empowered, and connected, embracing their unique journeys and celebrating their individuality. Offerings Ayurvedic Consultations & Therapies Acupuncture & Chinese Herbal Medicine Health & Empowerment Coaching Core Values: Liberation: We believe in empowering women to liberate themselves from societal expectations and embrace their authentic selves. Freedom: We encourage women to find freedom within themselves, embracing their choices, desires, and passions without judgment or limitations. Embodiment: We advocate for deepening the connection between mind, body, and spirit, nurturing self-awareness and fostering a sense of embodiment. Sexuality: We support women in exploring and celebrating their sexuality, promoting a positive and empowering relationship with their bodies and desires. Empowerment: We strive to empower women by providing them with knowledge, tools, and support to make informed decisions about their health and well-being. Testimonials Subscribe to our newsletter. When you sign up for the Living Prem Newsletter, you will receive a free Three Day Ayurvedic Kitchari Cleanse Guidebook. We respect your privacy.
